title: [River's Rest Hall, Anchor Room]
description: Padded wooden chairs surround a stout oak table, its surface inlaid with a wooden design depicting a ship's bell.  Anchors of many shapes and sizes dangle from the walls, some serving as coat hooks.  The porthole-shaped window is dark.

Padded wooden chairs surround a stout oak table, its surface inlaid with a wooden design depicting a ship's bell.  Anchors of many shapes and sizes dangle from the walls, some serving as coat hooks.  A large round window, reminiscent of a porthole, allows light into the room.
